text: Club de Fútbol Universidad Nacional A. C., commonly known as Pumas de la UNAM, or just Pumas, is a Mexican football club from Mexico City. ==Honours== ===Domestic tournaments=== *Mexican Primera División: 7 ::1976-77, 1980–81, 1990–91, Clausura 2004, Apertura 2004, Clausura 2009, Clausura 2011 *Segunda División de México: 1 ::1961–62 *Copa México: 1 ::1974–75 *Campeón de Campeones: 2 ::1975, 2004 ===International tournaments=== *CONCACAF Champions League: 3 ::1980, 1982, 1989 *Copa Interamericana: 1 ::1981 *Copa Sudamericana: 0 ::Runner-up: 2005 ===Friendly Tournaments=== *Copa Universidades de América: 1 ::2000 *Trofeo Santiago Bernabéu: 1 ::2004 *Copa Chiapas: 1 ::2008 ==References== Category:Mexican football clubs Category:Sport in Mexico City Category:1954 establishments in North America Category:1950s establishments in Mexico
title: Club Universidad Nacional
